price: Na tukambashiria kuzaliwa Is-haqa, naye ni Nabii miongoni mwa watu wema.
footnotes: Na kwa amri yetu, Malaika walimbashiria kuwa ataruzukiwa mwana, Is-haqa juu ya kukata tamaa na kuwa mkewe ni tasa. Na kwamba yeye hakika atakuwa Nabii miongoni mwa walio wema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

translations: And We gave him glad tidings
